title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.
OB: The label height remains the same even after changing the label font size to a larger value.
EB: The label height should adjust automatically to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Change the font size of the label to be 18 points.
3. Observe that the label height does not change accordingly.
